member_organisations:
The AIC reviews its membership and statistics on a daily basis, the most recent update will always be found here: http://www.theaic.co.uk/aic/find-compare-investment-companies 
 
Note that the AIC's members are the investment companies, not the portfolio managers.
fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Business and Industry, Single market
eu_initiatives:
Building a Capital Markets Union 
Review of the Prospectus Directive 
Key Information Documents for Packaged Retail Investment and Insurance Products 
Markets in Financial Instruments Directive II 
Shareholder Rights Directive 
Risk Capital Guidelines for State aid 
Cross Border distribution of Collective Investment Funds 
Benchmark regulations 
Brexit
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: The AIC represents the views and concerns of investment companies and their shareholders on relevant legal, regulatory and tax issues to governmental and regulatory organisations.
legal_status: Trade body (incorporated as a company limited by guarantee)
